name: cardano-graphql
description: A TypeScript monorepo. Includes a server package and API modules for flexible implementation

scripts.cleanup: yarn workspaces run cleanup && shx rm -rf node_modules
scripts.mainnet:stack: API_PORT=3100 HASURA_PORT=8090 NETWORK=mainnet POSTGRES_PORT=5442 docker-compose -p mainnet up --build -d
scripts.mainnet:dev: API_PORT=3100 HASURA_PORT=8090 NETWORK=mainnet POSTGRES_PORT=5442 yarn service-dependencies -p mainnet up --build
scripts.mainnet:server: ALLOW_INTROSPECTION=true API_PORT=3100 GENESIS_FILE_BYRON=${PWD}/config/network/mainnet/genesis/byron.json GENESIS_FILE_SHELLEY=${PWD}/config/network/mainnet/genesis/shelley.json HASURA_CLI_PATH=hasura HASURA_URI=http://localhost:8090 POSTGRES_DB_FILE=${PWD}/config/secrets/postgres_db POSTGRES_PASSWORD_FILE=${PWD}/config/secrets/postgres_password POSTGRES_USER_FILE=${PWD}/config/secrets/postgres_user POSTGRES_HOST=localhost POSTGRES_PORT=5442 yarn workspace @cardano-graphql/server start
